physical_appearance: This is an embroidered yoke. It is red, with silver and gold embroided geometric patterns. There is a square hole in the middle of the garment. The garment looks slightly frayed around the edges.
sgcool_label_text: A finely embroidered yoke, that would have been stitched on to a blouse or tunic, to be worn by a Sindhi woman.
subject_terms_1: geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) tunics folk costume
subject_terms_2: Clothing and dress Sindhi (South Asian people) Motifs Embroidery Tunics Ethnic costume
